item.title: [PI] Saving Characters to C: file [PI]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“zablie, post:1, topic:419246”][code] public static int loadGame(Client p, String playerName, String playerPass) {
String line = “”;
String token = “”;
String token2 = “”;
String[] token3 = new String[3];
boolean EndOfFile = false;
int ReadMode = 0;
BufferedReader characterfile = null;
boolean File1 = false;

	try {
		characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(
				"C:/Accounts/" + playerName + ".txt"));
		File1 = true;
	} catch (FileNotFoundException fileex1) {
	}

	if (File1) {
		 new File ("C:/Accounts/"+playerName+".txt");
	} else {
		Misc.println(playerName + ": character file not found.");
		p.newPlayer = false;
		return 0;
	}
	try {
		line = characterfile.readLine();
	} catch (IOException ioexception) {
		Misc.println(playerName + ": Error loading file!");
		return 3;
	}[/code]

I made a file called Accounts in my C: and changed the Playersave.java but it wont load and add Accounts to C:/Accounts. Help :([/quote]
Un comment,

 new File ("C:/Accounts/"+playerName+".txt");

Like I did above.

Read full topic
